entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content:
Hi there!

If this is your first time to this website, read this page to learn about Elements of Harmony and us, XUOGROUP.

If not, just continue your reading, have a nice day!

Hello for your visiting this instruction page. This is Andy-K-Sparklight speaking.

You may feel strange about my avatar, that’s because…

Andy has a crush on Rainbow Dash!

Nope, not at all.

(That must be Fish Chan)

Elements of Harmony, just like it’s name, is a Minecraft MOD, and, obviously, is inspired of My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic.

This MOD, which is build with Forge API, inserts six Elements of Harmony into Minecraft. These elements are:

  • Loyalty
  • Laughter
  • Generosity
  • Honesty
  • Kindness
  • Magic

(They are arranged in the order in My Little Pony Theme Song)

All we want to do is to make Minecraft as close as possible to Equestria, and Elements of Harmony is an essential part. It includes:

  • Six Elements, including their various forms.
  • Advancements of your life in Minecraft. (Not Featured)
  • A (or more) Dimension(s) for Equestria. (Not Featured)
  • Basic Support for further development. (Not Featured)

Yes, we’re still in progress, you can Watch, Star our repo on GitHub.

Feel free to open an Issue or a Pull Request!

About us:

XUOGROUP has following members now (still appending):

  • Andy K Sparklight (AG), the leader and the main author & developer.
  • Fish Chan(CSY), the supporter.
  • K Twily, a cute child who always has some questions.

Want to join or help? Mail to us:

  • Private Inbox
  • Public Inbox

OK, that’s all, thank you for reading!
